fields.description: The name of an IoT Hub Consumer Group that should be used to read events from the IoT Hub. If not specified, the input uses the Iot Hubâ€™s default consumer group.
fields.name: ConsumerGroupName

fields.description: The IoT Hub endpoint to connect to (ie. messages/events, messages/operationsMonitoringEvents, etc.).
fields.name: Endpoint

fields.description: The name or the URI of the IoT Hub. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.
fields.name: IotHubNamespace

fields.description: The shared access policy key for the specified shared access policy. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.
fields.name: SharedAccessPolicyKey

fields.description: The shared access policy name for the IoT Hub. This policy must contain at least the Service connect permission. Required on PUT (CreateOrReplace) requests.
fields.name: SharedAccessPolicyName
